name: Post Search Ajax
author: Hassanal S. Aguam

sections.description:
Post Search ajax – is a live search plugin for WordPress. This already responsive live search engine, which will help your user experience by providing a user friendly ajax for your user. and also supported by the shortcode.

Plugin Features:

  1. You Can Search using Ajax.
  2. You can Change the layout of the Search form and Result.
  3. Its easy to use.
  4. Tested up to latest WordPress
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
1. Download and install the plugin from WordPress dashboard. You can also upload the entire “Post Search Ajax” folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
1. Done
sections.faq:
Is this working on the localhost ?

Nope. it should be on the live site

Is this plugin tested work?

Yes.

What is the used of [searchformajax] ?

This is the Search form or input.

What is the used of [searchresult] ?

This is the Search result of your searchform.

Can I Change the Layout ?

Yes. by using the two ShortCode [searchformajax] and [searchresult].
